structural_unit_name.en: Chair of Programming Languages and Systems

name.en: Chair of Programming Languages and Systems

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en:
We use material from "The Software Foundations" series Volume 1: "Logical Foundations" and Volume 3: "Verified Functional Algorithms". Volume 1 is an intro to Coq and logic and Volume 3 deals with Verified Functional Algorithms.

List of chapters/topics: "Logical Foundations": Basics, Induction, Lists, Polymorphism, Tactics, Logics in Coq, Inductively defined Propositions, Maps, Simple Imperative Programs, More Automation. "Verified Functional Algorithms:: Basic Techniques for Permutations and Ordering, Insertion sort, Insertion Sort With Multisets, Selection sort, Search trees, Abstract data types, Runninc Coq programs in ML, Red-Black trees, Number Representations and Efficient Lookup Tables, Priority Queues, Binomial Queues, Programming with Decision Procedures
description.et:
Kursus toimub "Software Foundations" materjalide põhjal, kus kaetakse Volume 1: "Logical Foundations" ja Volume 3: "Verified Functional Algorithms". Esimene raamat katab Coq-i algõpet ja loogika aluseid, teine tegeleb algoritmide korrektsuse tõestamisega. 

Peatükkide/teemade loetelu: "Logical Foundations": Basics, Induction, Lists, Polymorphism, Tactics, Logics in Coq, Inductively defined Propositions, Maps, Simple Imperative Programs, More Automation. "Verified Functional Algorithms": Basic Techniques for Permutations and Ordering, Insertion sort, Insertion Sort With Multisets, Selection sort, Search trees, Abstract data types, Runninc Coq programs in ML, Red-Black trees, Number Representations and Efficient Lookup Tables, Priority Queues, Binomial Queues, Programming with Decision Procedures

objectives.en: a) a better understanding of formal proofs,
b) practical ability to prove something in Coq,
objectives.et: b) praktiline oskus Coq-iga midagi tõestada,

objectives.en: c) understanding of the difficulties of correctness proofs of algorithms,
objectives.et: c) arusaam koodi korrektsuse tõestamise keerukusest ja

objectives.en: d) practical experience of writing verified functional algorithm
objectives.et: d) praktiline kogemuse kontrollitud algoritmide kirjutamisest.

learning_outcomes.en: A student, that has completed the course:
a) knows common concepts of logic and proving,
learning_outcomes.et: a) teab loogika ja tõestamise põhilisi mõisteid,

learning_outcomes.en: b) is able to understands the meaning of propositions written in Coq,
learning_outcomes.et: b) saab aru Coq süsteemis kirjutatud väidete sisust,

learning_outcomes.en: c) can prove simple propositions in Coq, and
learning_outcomes.et: c) oskab Coq-is tõestada lihtsaid väiteid,

learning_outcomes.en: d) can write simple verified functional algorithms.
learning_outcomes.et: d) oskab kirjutada lihtsaid kontrollitult korrektseid funktsionaalseid algoritme.
